text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: The Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
How cruel that the race with the<n>greatest history, tradition,
and renown<n>can only be entered once in a<n>runner's life.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Many famed racers have suffered<n>defeat in the face of their
dream—the<n>dream of every Umamusume—to<n>reach the
pinnacle of racing and<n>become Derby champion.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
On that day, an astounding 200,000<n>fans watched as the
gates opened.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
In the Derby, it's no easy feat to take<n>an early lead and
keep it. But the<n>runner in pink insisted on doing it her<n>own
way.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
What unfolded was not a race to<n>outrun the rest. It was a
high-speed<n>war of attrition.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She'd barely shaken off her<n>opponents when she crossed
the<n>finish line. Her body exhausted, she<n>hadn't the energy
left for one more<n>step.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Her only way to win was to put every<n>ounce of her being
into it.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: The champion's name was Ines<n>Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
The roaring applause that echoed<n>throughout the racecourse
in Fuchu<n>that day still resounds in the mind of<n>every fan.
Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the final straight! Which racer has<n>what it takes to stand
victorious?!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You can do iiit!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wooow! They're all so fast!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leader has a burst of speed! Now,<n>the runner in second
place advances<n>from the opposite side of the pack!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ah! The girl in front is gonna lose the<n>lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And she takes the lead! Just like that,<n>she pushes ahead!
She widens the<n>gap between herself and her rival!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh no, I feel so bad for her...

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Look, she hasn't given up yet. So you<n>shouldn't give up
either. Why don't<n>you keep cheering her on?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sob... You can do it! Keep going!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's going all the way! There's the<n>finish! She bested her
rivals, taking the<n>crown in a stunning victory!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Awww, she lost... She's crying...

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Yes, it's sad after she ran so well.<n>But look, the winner's
crying too.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You're right... Why?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text: The Derby is the dream of every one<n>of these racers.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text:
So whether they win or lose, they'll<n>cry. Because they gave
it their very all<n>to make their dream come true. They<n>
worked so hard for this.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Dream... Derby...

At Tracen Academy, the swelteringly<n>hot days are beginning
to cool down.

And the academy's annual autumn<n>event, the Solefall Faire,
is almost<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: All right! Landed a cabbage supplier!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Cabbage? What are you talkingabout?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The Solefall Faire, you ding-dong!<n>I've been planning to sell
my special<n>Golshi yakisoba there since forever<n>ago!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And I need you and our trusty trainer<n>to pitch in. You'd
better start practicing<n>your griddle skills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I don't like the sound of this at all...<n>I'll have you taste it
first, Trainer.<n>Someone needs to check if it's safe.
choice_data_list:
Safe? Don't you mean I should check if it tastes
good?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry your pretty face. I'm not<n>gonna use anything
inedible. Just<n>cabbage, carrots, wasabi paste,<n>grated
wasabi, and diced wasabi.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How much wasabi are you using?!

The whole academy is frantically<n>preparing for the festival.
In the midst<n>of all the uproar, someone comes to<n>see me.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: There you are.

Tazuna Hayakawa, assistant to the<n>director of Tracen,
approaches with a<n>big smile.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I have big news. ♪ Your predecessor<n>is being given an
award by the URA.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: An award? For what? Getting a kitten<n>out of a tree?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know? It's an honor given<n>to racers and trainers
who've made<n>outstanding achievements.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Some make it their mission to get it.<n>Winners get their photo
and race<n>record displayed in the Umamusume<n>Museum at
the Tokyo Racecourse.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
And who more fitting than him?<n>Oguri's final race is still a
favorite<n>among fans.

It's not just the fans. Mejiro<n>McQueen and I will never
forget that<n>Arima Kinen run either.

It's not just the fans. Mejiro<n>McQueen and I will never
forget that<n>Arima Kinen run either.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: My mentor really was out of this<n>world. Truly amazing.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
The awards ceremony will be<n>broadcast live, so don't miss
it!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: In other matters, I have a small favor<n>to ask...

Tazuna directs me to the academy<n>library, where I've been
asked to help<n>a student prepare something for the<n>Solefall
Faire.
Waaaaah! I'm gonna CRY!
No matter how many defeats orinjuries, she kept on running. Thisracer had SO much heart. Sob...

Her voice shatters the silence of the<n>library. With no one
else around, I<n>know who it is I'm supposed to<n>assist.
choice_data_list:
Are you the one who needs help with the
Solefall Faire?

Are you the one who needs help with the
Solefall Faire?

text_block_list.text:
Ah! Are you the trainer Ms. Tazuna<n>was talking about?
Thank<n>goodneeess! Finally some help! I'm<n>SAVED!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wait... I didn't introduce myself! Nice<n>to meet ya! I'm
Winning Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Really though, I volunteered 'cause I<n>had this rad idea, but
now that I'm in<n>the thick of prepping, I can't manage<n>at
all.
choice_data_list: I'm here to help. What do you need?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Straight to the point! I need to make<n>displays for a Derby
history exhibit!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We're gonna display it all! The<n>passion and excitement of
each and<n>every racer who took on the Derby,<n>with no
details left out!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Like this racer who sprinted into firstplace from way outside! After allthe hard work it took to reach theDerby, it's like she knew that was hermoment!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And this one—she took a hugelead right from the start, kept it all theway to the end and took first! It'ssuper hard to pull off a win like that,but she knew she could do it. Sob...

The Derby is a prestigious race, and<n>it's often thought to be
the top event<n>of the Twinkle Series.

Some people even think the year<n>begins and ends with it.
It's definitely<n>a big deal.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The Derby really is the best! Yeeeah!<n>I wanna be Derby
champiooon!
Her eyes tear up as she talks. She<n>must really love it...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for staying so late! When it<n>comes to the Derby, I
just get so<n>pumped up, you know?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No problem. It's super interesting.<n>It's really special for you,
huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No problem. It's super interesting.<n>It's really special for you,
huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! The Derby's my dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna enter someday and win it!<n>It's my dream to
stand among the<n>greats and make my own amazing<n>story!

Looking at the excited racer as she<n>cries with emotion, it's
hard to believe<n>how she can be so breathtakingly<n>earnest.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, first I need to be scouted to do it.<n>And it's gotta be a
trainer who can<n>take me all the way there!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I have to focus on the exhibit!<n>We can't fail if we
work together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And you know, you can call me<n>Tickezo. Easier than saying
my full<n>name, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe! Thanks, Trainer!

Who knows whether she can get into<n>the Derby, let alone
win it?

But one thing's for sure. Her chasing<n>that purehearted
dream is a story I'd<n>love to watch unfold.
